title: Panel, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk on silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered on satin weave
creditline: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Long, narrow shaped panel of white satin decorated with ribbon embroidery and silk thread. Designs of delicate festoons of flowers and ribbons extend almost entirely across the panel, primarily in narrow ribbons instead of silk thread. Some festoons of dots outlined in metallic thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: silk on silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered on satin weave. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1950-121-61.
